snippet: The first Latin on Lex festival will include Eddie Palmieri, Yosvany Terry and more.
abstract: The first Latin on Lex festival will include Eddie Palmieri, Yosvany Terry and more.
lead_paragraph: The 92nd Street Y has announced its first Latin jazz festival, Latin on Lex, to be held March 12 to 14. Organized by the trumpeter Brian Lynch, it will feature artists eminent and up-and-coming in three theme concerts. The kickoff, on March 12, is a showcase for the pianist and bandleader Eddie Palmieri, with whom Mr. Lynch shared a Grammy for best Latin jazz album in 2006. They’ll perform together in Mr. Palmieri’s Afro-Caribbean Jazz Octet.

headline.main: 92nd Street Y Announces Latin Jazz Festival
